name: Noto Serif
description: Noto is a global font collection for writing in all modern and ancient languages. Noto Serif is a modulated (“serif”) design for texts in the Latin, Cyrillic and Greek scripts, also suitable as the complementary font for other script-specific Noto Serif fonts. It has italic styles, multiple weights and widths, and 3,256 glyphs.
author: Google
